product.longDescription:
Authentic flavor and appearance. Tall and relatively slow to bolt with large, dark green leaves about 3" long. This common strain of Genovese basil can present some variability in leaf shape and plant size. While quite suitable for field and garden, we recommend using a more modern and more uniform variety for greenhouse, container, or hydroponic production, such as Genovese Compact Improved, Aroma 2, Nufar, Dolly, Elidia, or Eleonora. Ht. 24-30".

•Edible Flowers: Use the flowers in any recipe that calls for basil, or to garnish drinks, salads, soups, pasta, and desserts. Flavor is of intense basil.

Choose organic seed, conventional seed, or organic seed with NOP-compliant pelleting. Avg. 19,300 seeds/oz. Packet: 200 seeds.

Genovese Basil Seed

Product ID:911.32911

Authentic flavor and appearance. Tall and relatively slow to bolt with large, dark green leaves about 3" long. This common strain of Genovese basil can present some variability in leaf shape and plant size. While quite suitable for field and garden, we recommend using a more modern and more uniform variety for greenhouse, container, or hydroponic production, such as Genovese Compact Improved, Aroma 2, Nufar, Dolly, Elidia, or Eleonora. Ht. 24-30".

•Edible Flowers: Use the flowers in any recipe that calls for basil, or to garnish drinks, salads, soups, pasta, and desserts. Flavor is of intense basil.

Choose organic seed, conventional seed, or organic seed with NOP-compliant pelleting. Avg. 19,300 seeds/oz. Packet: 200 seeds.
